body_html: @yaroslavvb Does the current tensorflow version release the gradOutputs and the activations from the memory as soon as the gradInputs are computed? The peak memory will be achieved when the first gradInput is computed, if I'm correct.
body_text: @yaroslavvb Does the current tensorflow version release the gradOutputs and the activations from the memory as soon as the gradInputs are computed? The peak memory will be achieved when the first gradInput is computed, if I'm correct.
body: @yaroslavvb Does the current tensorflow version release the gradOutputs and the activations from the memory as soon as the gradInputs are computed? The peak memory will be achieved when the first gradInput is computed, if I'm correct.
